select id id, parent_id parentId, detail_id detailId, executor_id executorId, audit_id auditId,
count count, state state, cuser cuser, cdate cdate, uuser uuser,
udate udate, remark remark, isdisable isdisable from vmes_warehouse_check_execute
and ${queryStr}
and code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}),'%')
and name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}),'%')
order by ${orderStr}

select checkExecute.id id, checkExecute.parent_id parentId, checkExecute.detail_id detailId, checkExecute.executor_id executorId, user.user_name executorName, checkExecute.audit_id auditId,
round(ifnull(checkExecute.count, 0), 2) count, checkExecute.state state, CASE WHEN checkExecute.state = '0' THEN '' WHEN checkExecute.state = '2' THEN '同意' WHEN checkExecute.state = '3' THEN '不同意' ELSE null END stateName, checkExecute.cuser cuser, DATE_FORMAT(checkExecute.cdate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') cdate, checkExecute.uuser uuser,
DATE_FORMAT(checkExecute.udate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') udate, checkExecute.remark remark, checkExecute.isdisable isdisable,
warehouse.path_name pathName, warehouse.code warehouseCode,
detail.warehouse_product_id warehouseProductId, detail.warehouse_id warehouseId, detail.product_id productId, detail.code code, detail.state detailState, CASE WHEN detail.state = '0' THEN '待派单' WHEN detail.state = '1' THEN '执行中' WHEN detail.state = '2' THEN '审核中' WHEN detail.state = '3' THEN '已完成' WHEN detail.state = '-1' THEN '已取消' ELSE null END detailStateName,
round(ifnull(detail.stock_count, 0), 2) stockCount,
product.code productCode, product.name productName, product.spec productSpec, produnit.unit productUnit, product.genre productGenre, product.type productType, unit.name productUnitName, genre.name productGenreName from vmes_warehouse_check_execute checkExecute left join vmes_user user on checkExecute.executor_id = user.id left join vmes_warehouse_check_detail detail on checkExecute.detail_id = detail.id left join vmes_warehouse_product wp on detail.warehouse_product_id = wp.id left join vmes_warehouse warehouse on detail.warehouse_id = warehouse.id and warehouse.isdisable = '1' left join vmes_product product on detail.product_id = product.id and product.isdisable = '1' left join vmes_product_unit produnit on produnit.product_id = product.id and produnit.type = 1 left join vmes_dictionary unit on produnit.unit = unit.id left join vmes_dictionary genre on product.genre = genre.id
and checkExecute.parent_id = #{parentId}
and checkExecute.state = #{detailState}
and checkExecute.isdisable = '1'
order by ${orderStr}
